entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
